name: Last of the Noticers
description:
For the past few years, you've noticed things, things about life, things about others, things about the world and about geopolitics. And none of it is adding up. Today, you woke up and decided to do something about it. Or will you?

Choose the path you will take during this non-linear FPS

- Walk through life as a good little NPC, interacting with your fellow NPCs along the way, and avoid succumbing to the monotony of it all

OR

- Reach into your bag and become the main character for a change

DURING THE ADVENTURE:

- Liquidate any denizen or fed that gives you trouble

- Generate as much (or as little) social credit as possible to justify your rating as a person

- Unlock weapons with different effects depending upon your social credit score

- Partake in the use of inhalants to ensure today's adventure is as long and as amusing as you want it to be

How will you spend this day you woke up to?
